fun_moment.text: The time Clott fell out of the SWS helicopter!

about.fun_fact: 83% of Bin Weevils have been fooled by one of Tink’s pranks!
about.text: This mischief-making trickster is always coming up with kooky schemes to earn Mulch. His best pal, Clott, is never far from his side, and together they’ve come up with some epic pranks. The Bin buddies are constantly getting into sticky situations!
